title: Lasagna
ingredients: ½ cup plus 2 tablespoons grated parmesan or romano
directions: Cut mozzarella into ½ inch cubes.
In small bowl, combine ricotta, ½ cup of Parmesan, and 1 tbsp of water from boiling pasta pot. Season mixture with salt and pepper.
To assemble lasagna, lay down 1 cup of tomato sauce, followed by noodle, followed by 1/3 of cheese. Repeat.
Bake in oven. After 30 minutes, cover with foil. Bake another 20 minutes until hot and bubbly.
Let stand, covered for 15 minutes before cutting.
